mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY WHERE STUDY_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT S.STUDY_NO, S.STUDY_TITLE, TO_CHAR(S.STUDY_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "STUDY_CREATE_DATE", S.STUDY_COUNT, COALESCE(G.LIKE_COUNT, 0) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM STUDY S LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RSTUDY_NO, COUNT(*) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM STUDYGOOD WHERE STUDY_GOOD_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY RSTUDY_NO ) G ON S.STUDY_NO = G.RSTUDY_NO WHERE S.STUDY_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY S.STUDY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY( STUDY_NO, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_CONTENT, STUDY_LINK ) VALUES ( SEQ_STUDY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{studyTitle}, #{studyContent}, #{studyLink} )
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDY SET STUDY_COUNT = STUDY_COUNT + 1 WHERE STUDY_NO = #{studyNo} AND STUDY_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_NO, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_CONTENT, STUDY_COUNT, TO_CHAR(STUDY_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "STUDY_CREATE_DATE", STUDY_LINK FROM STUDY WHERE STUDY_STATUS = 'Y' AND STUDY_NO = #{studyNo}
